name: Keep it away from my lawn.
name_original: Keep it away from my lawn.
description:
Submission to the 4th Ben Bonk Jam

note: the html version is darker than intended, if you want to play it correctly download the game :)

The theme for the Jam was "keep it away", so i instantly thought about unrespectful neighbours letting their dogs pee in your freshly cut lawn...

The game is about avoiding this. You have the "Keep Awayer" by your side and you have to make sure that dog are not able to pee in your lawn! But careful not to "Keep Away" the dogs that haven't bothered you (yet).

The complete game has been made in less than 72h (not continuous) by one person (me, @paraxodon on twitter ;))))) )

CONTROLS

  • Movement:  WASD / Left Joystick (untested)
  • Camera Movement:  MOUSE / Right Joystick (untested)
  • "Keep Awayer":  LEFT CLICK / RIGHT TRIGGER (untested)

CREDITS

The coding, design and art has been all made by me (@paraxodon), but most of the sound comes from a library i bought some time ago that i can't remember the name of (so i cannot give proper credit, sorry :,) ), youtube and PixaBay, always checking that it was completely free for use :).
